# eui-message



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description     | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `nzDuration`| `nzDuration` | Duration (milliseconds), does not disappear when set to 0 | `number` | `3000` |
| `nzMaxStack`| `nzMaxStack` | The maximum number of messages that can be displayed at the same time | `number` | `7` |
| `nzPauseOnHover`| `nzPauseOnHover` | Do not remove automatically when mouse is over while setting to `true` | `boolean` | `true` |
| `nzAnimate`| `nzAnimate` | Whether to turn on animation | `boolean` | `true` |
| `nzTop`| `nzTop` | Distance from top | `number \| string` | `24` |
| `nzDirection`| `nzDirection` | Direction of the text in the messages | `'ltr' \| 'rtl'` | - |
